andalus_df = ar_poems.loc[ar_poems['poet_cat'] == "العصر الأندلسي"]
andalus_text = []
andalus_text.extend(andalus_df["poem_text"])

andalus_nature = 0
for nature_word in nature_words:
        for word in andalus_text:
            if nature_word in word:
                andalus_nature += 1

andalus_rows = andalus_df.shape[0]
andalus_rate_nature = andalus_nature/andalus_rows
print("عدد تكرار أسماء عناصر الطبيعة بالشعر الأندلسي هو :", andalus_nature, "مرة", "وبمعدل" , andalus_rate_nature)
